pages.text: $(li)The Dunes is a dry biome composed mainly of Arid Sand and Red Sand.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Even being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation like Yuccas Trees, Aloe Vera plants and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l).

$(li)There are even animals that can withstand these harsh conditions, like the $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/rattlesnake)Rattlesnakes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/fly)Flies$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/emu)Emu$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroos$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/tarantula_hawk)Tarantula Hawks$(/l).$(br)$(li)On the night the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/husk)Husk$(/l) will be around the Dunes too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Dunes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
